product.name: Lotion For Cleansing
product.content: Universal foundation masks skin imperfections and gives it a matte finish, remaining completely invisible on the face. The foundation is suitable for any skin type. Thanks to a unique combination of pigments, the foundation adapts perfectly to even the smallest features of skin tone, creating an even and natural tone
